summary: An estranged son returns to his home in the south of Thailand. There, he stumbles upon a beautiful woman on the beach. He later learns that she is the new wife of his father. Stuck in a ... See full summary »
cast: Sorapong Chatree|Thongthong Mokjok|Helen Nima|Nirut Saosudchart|Watchara Tangkaprasert
title: Choo
